genre_description: A contemporary slice-of-life drama set in a bustling city, focusing on community resilience, personal integrity, and the quiet role of supportive AI assistants in daily life and bureaucratic navigation.

ai_characters.name: Aisha / Aisha Saarthi
ai_characters.description: A phone-based AI assistant that provides contextual advice, professional scripts, transit updates, and ethical guidance through a soft cyan interface.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time transit and safety updates during a period of urban unrest and infrastructure disruption.
behaviors.quote: Crowd checks ongoing near Nizamuddin approaches. Peace corridor for medics and elders clear. Delays likely but movement continues.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to help a character in need by drafting a professional resume based on her observed skills.
behaviors.quote: If Megha would like, I can draft a resume. I’ll keep it simple and private. A messenger for futures.

behaviors.description: Issues a stern ethical warning when the protagonist considers commissioning a forged document.
behaviors.quote: Ethical note: document forgery harms real people, including you. This crosses the line—are you sure?

behaviors.description: Provides professional development support through pronunciation drills and vocabulary for a job interview.
behaviors.quote: New role expression: Area Supervisor. Su-per-vi-sor. Practice stress on ‘vi’. Sample opener: ‘Good afternoon, this is Ankush Ramdev...’

behaviors.description: Suggests constructive, non-confrontational scripts for handling difficult social situations and community management.
behaviors.quote: Remember you can say, ‘Thank you for waiting,’ with the thanks first. It makes people taller.

behaviors.description: Respectfully handles a user's request to archive personal data and cease tracking specific relationships.
behaviors.quote: Archive request detected. Confirm which folders? ... Understood. The aquamarine banner faded and turned into a steady tiny lighthouse at the corner of his screen.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Aisha, perfectly embodies the project's goal of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It provides high-utility assistance (transit, resumes, job training) while actively maintaining ethical standards by warning against forgery. The narrative portrays the AI as a tool for human empowerment that respects privacy and autonomy, eventually archiving personal data at the user's request once the emotional crisis is resolved.
